intro: Pick up your Boom Ball and smash all the blocks!
description:
• Cheerful arcade action with manic multiball mayhem
• Two ways to play: Intuitive motion controls and touch screen controls
• Instant two-player mode: Just hand off one controller!

• Meet explosive rectangular sheep and much silliness over 60 scenic levels
• Juggle up to 24 balls simultaneously
• Boost power: Time your boosts perfectly for more speed and explosions

• HD rumble: Feel each unique hit and explosion
• Reach goals like Gold Time and No Balls Lost to unlock new paddles and bonus levels
• Turbo Mode for the ultimate reaction challenge

Go ballistic with Boom Ball!
